name: Galactic Gunner (itch) (Daisy-123123)
description:
Welcome to Galactic Gunner!

In this game, you play as a spaceship, shooting down enemy spaceships to score points. 

The game has three modes:

  • Easy
  • Medium
  • Hard

The controls:

  • WASD (or arrow keys) for movement
  • Move CURSOR to aim
  • SPACE to shoot

I hope you like my game!
